name: Digioh Forms, Popups, Quizzes, Surveys, Abandon Cart
author: Digioh

sections.installation:
1. Install Digioh either via the WordPress.org plugin repository or by uploading the files to your server.

  2. Activate the Digioh plugin.

  3. In WordPress, navigate to Settings > Digioh Settings and enter your Digioh Client GUID. To find your Client GUID, log into Digioh, click your name in the top-right corner, and copy your GUID from the dropdown menu that appears. (Note: the GUID can only be seen by Admin users, not subusers.)

  4. Select the deployment mode appropriate to your needs: Low Impact, Fast Activation, or Compatibility.

  5. Save Settings
sections.faq:
Does this plugin cost money?

No, but it does require an active Digioh subscription.

Does the Digioh plugin have any Theme dependencies?

No, Digioh will work with any theme because it works by overlaying on top of the page. For Box injection into the page, you may need some HTML knowledge as styles and layout vary from theme to theme.
sections.description:
Turn visitors into customers with a suite of list growth and conversion rate optimization tools that drive revenue. Supports WooCommerce.

About Digioh

Grow your email + SMS marketing list, capture zero-party data, and drive more sales with high-converting product recommendation quizzes, on-site surveys, landing pages, and preference centers. Take full advantage of the power of data and quickly reap the rewards of personalized on-site, email, SMS, and re-targeting experiences.

Digioh allows marketers to gather more consumer-consented, zero-party data than ANY other platform in the market and leverage this data across ALL marketing channels. Increase conversions with product recommendation quizzes, learn more about first-time website visitors with pre-purchase surveys, then continue the conversation via email or SMS based on this data, increasing the likelihood of a new customer gained, higher LTV, and lower opt-out rates.

With over 1700 customers, 200+ integrations, and 2 billion bits of zero-party data collected daily, there’s no platform stronger than Digioh to help drive incremental revenue growth, build customer experience, and harvest + activate zero-party data in forward-thinking, innovative ways. And with Digioh’s full-service design and technical support team, you can launch quickly, driving ROI and incremental success within 30 days!

Plugin Description

Digioh is a flexible and powerful Marketing Layer for your website with which you can:

  • Trigger popups, banners, and lightboxes
  • Power product recommendation quizzes to get visitors to the checkout
  • Embed forms on your pages without modifying the page
  • Implement complex progressive (multi-step) forms
  • Power surveys, quizzes, and product recommendation
  • Trigger CTAs on Exit Intent for cart abandonment
  • A/B Test creative and/or targeting rules to maximize conversion rates
  • Implement behavioral personalization based on user actions
  • Target CTAs based on external data sources such as Segment, Google Analytics, and a variety of CDPs
  • Integrate with any Email Platform, CRM, and Analytics Tool
  • … and many more powerful capabilities

Digioh is ideal for marketers in eCommerce, Publishing, and Not-for-Profit businesses looking to convert their site visitors into customers, subscribers, or donators.

Digioh Plugin
Digioh is a SaaS service. This plugin allows easy installation, configuration, and connection of Digioh to your WordPress and/or WooCommerce site. To create a Digioh account, visit Digioh.com and click “Get a Demo”.

Quick Video Overview of Features

Learn More About our Drag-and-Drop Editor

Performance

Site performance is critical in the SEO-driven online world, so this plugin provides options to balance performance and timeliness. With our Low Impact deployment mode, Digioh registers as having no impact with Google Page Speed Insights.
